dataTransfer.sql: select alarmEventId, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, districtId, districtName, companyId, companyName, vehicleCode, plateNum, plateColorCode, vehicleOperateTypeId, vehicleOperateTypeCode, vehicleOperateTypeName, alarmTypeCode, driverwarningtype, alarmLevel, eventId, substring(eventStartTime,0,19) eventStartTime,0,19, eventStartLongitude, eventStartLatitude, substring(eventEndTime,0,19) eventEndTime, eventEndLongitude, eventEndLatitude, eventPersistSeconds, eventStatus, eventPicGroupName, eventPicRemoteFileName, maxSpeed, minSpeed, avgSpeed, eventDesc, violationDistance, hasManual, status, substring(readTime,0,19) readTime, readUserId, substring(receiptTime,0,19) receiptTime, receiptUserId, hasUnReceiptMsg, substring(createTime,0,19) createTime, createUserId, substring(lastModifyTime,0,19) lastModifyTime, lastModifyUserId, valid, substring(eventOriginalTime,0,19) eventOriginalTime, eventOriginalLongitude, eventOriginalLatitude, eventStartDate, contrastPicRemoteFileName, contrastPicGroupName, similarityRatio, limitSpeed, operatorId, operatorName, alarmconfig_id, lastReceiveTime from tbalarmevent where eventStartTime >= '${stime}' and eventStartTime< '${etime}'
